import React, {useState} from 'react' import classes from './display.module.css' import unavailablePoster from './../img/unavailablePoster.jpeg' import LikeDislike from '../movieStorage/likeDislike' const Display = (props) => { const [movieInfo, setMovieInfo] = useState([]) // const[storeInfo, setStoreInfo] = useState("storeLikess") const posterSrc = props.movies.Poster==="N/A" ? unavailablePoster : props.movies.Poster; const posterSize = props.movies.Poster==="N/A" ? classes.defaultPoster : ''; setMovieInfo(props.movies) console.log("+++++"+props.movies.Title) const movieClickedHandler = () => { setMovieInfo(props.movies) console.log("*****"+movieInfo) } return(
{console.log(props.movies)} {}
{props.movies.Title}
) } export default Display
